statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
